documents.document: @SimpleSall StarWalk is an awesome app - brings the night sky to life!
@SimpleSall think it's Venus!
@matchavez departure. They are still cost cutting so I moved to @bauermedia
@Nomel79 ha! Excellent work. :)
@Whafe my advice to MPI end of this week will be to give serious drought considerations for HB, Gisborne & Northland some point in February
@Whafe yeah pretty much - sometimes you can get some spillover there from the west, but not often is it much (ie, more than 10/20mm)
@Whafe no the west - and front is dying around Southern HB by the looks of it, might rain further being night time and all..
@Nomel79 when you finally get around to this please take photos and send to me.
@Whafe you could sell that to eastern North Islanders for more than petrol!...which, oddly, is cheaper than water normally.....
@Whafe slip, slop, slap and cover up with a raincoat and all that other Summer advice...
@SimpleSall I thought the same thing.
Thank you @NewstalkZB & @nzherald for over 10 years of working together. Many of you like family, we'll stay in touch. V.excited about 2017!
I miss this view... https://t.co/fv0XKmjeNC
My pleasure Vince - am searching far and wide for rain for you! Thanks for your #HawkesBay update -- @Country_TV https://t.co/pqLDFkdMuP
This is the weirdest thing ever! https://t.co/fquOpiaNcq
@WhiteDiamonds13 hmmm, Sac i thought was a super clean, healthy place. Obv not (wasn't that a city that went bankrupt under Dems recently?)
@WhiteDiamonds13 definitely no pity - we all have our issues in life, but pain is not cool - you get some pity for that, sorry! :)
@WhiteDiamonds13 just very curious as to where in the US u can get poisoned like that. And yes I'm keeping faith that commonsense prevails
@WhiteDiamonds13 which State are you in?
@WhiteDiamonds13 I find it fascinating you follow me. I care very much - possibly too much. Always fighting left/right thoughts/ideals.
@WhiteDiamonds13 oh I am so so sorry to hear your news :( Seriously that is awful. Oh & work partially work in MSM - believe me I hear ya!
@WhiteDiamonds13 you're dying due to illness? Pres wants to end open visa from NZ/Australia, even thou we're part of US 5 eyes spy network.
@WhiteDiamonds13 Jesus talked about being good stewards of cash?! I thought he opened his arms to those in need without selfish question?
@WhiteDiamonds13 you're a Christian right? What part of the president's immigration policy sounds/is compassionate like Jesus taught us?
@WhiteDiamonds13 it's sad when you automatically think ppl who disagree with you hate America. I love America & now can't visit yearly.
@WhiteDiamonds13 You may not realise but these actions are making white christians not want to visit the US now, on a major scale.
@sillymidoff you have a sea breeze I think...lucky!
@sillymidoff I got SW where I am! Blaaaaaaaaaah. Looks like a hint of more easterlies next couple weeks too :) #Summer!
@oldmannato @farmerjase @bullhale I see Fox News just fired her! Sorry man...
@farmerjase @oldmannato @bullhale Thanks Jason - you're a fantastic guy, truly terrific. Thanks Nate - you must be "my brown guy" supporter
@GenePark @washingtonpost As a weather forecaster I have a number of analogies I want to use about this leaky White House!
@CivMilAir nice endorsement....I guess... Love your hashtag :)
@farmerjase @bullhale snow, gales, record breaking low
@farmerjase @bullhale my record was climbing it in 1hr 50 and getting down in 1hr 10. (i think!)
@five15design yeah it's depressing as heck,esp when you know the summer clock ticks faster in Otago !
@five15design ugh that is the most depressing summer tweet
Your long weekend forecast/infographic for upper North Island and Upper South Island - mmmm, summer!… https://t.co/2haPifMb9O
@five15design yeah but at least it's light for longer in Dunedin ... so um...more time to watch the said rain ☔️
@AndreneLow agreed re horrifying and fascinating! It's totally up to the GOP to manage him - but if they have the 'balls' is another thing
Yes, but go New Zealand, Australia, Canada :) https://t.co/R472nKeymh
@BenRoss_AKL @NZTAAkl that's the worst interchange ever - I will only use SH1 to avoid that one part, which defies the point of SH20.
@BenRoss_AKL @NZTAAkl shush - let me have a few good months on it before it turns to gridlock due to slow cars in fast lanes etc
@NZTAAkl I know I'm a nerd, but I'm super excited about this! Talk about having to wait 3 years to unwrap this present....
@AndrewKayNZ @trudinelson @MikePuruNZ @RadioLIVENZ I've been agreeing with @PeterDunneMP on this for years!! Yes to Feb!
Great chat with @trudinelson & @MikePuruNZ just then on @RadioLIVENZ - February looking to start more settled than January weather-wise.
Got an email last night from a central Hawkes Bay farmer who is nearly 80. He says about the #BigDry "Very dry now, worst in 50 odd years".
Don't worry, Sunday's high in #Gisborne has now dropped from 35 to 34... https://t.co/7tqsBE55gn
Airliner causes rare fallstreak hole in clouds above South Australia's Riverland https://t.co/ShMZvQo867 via @ABCNews
@PhilipDuncan @RFStew @FlyAirNZ hopefully their Accountant CEO will see the $ they are about to lose if the US impose this dumb idea.
@RFStew @FlyAirNZ damn I just deleted that tweet as had a better version! But yes, too right/good point.
@RFStew @nzherald a terrific read - so accurate.
@RFStew Stunning. Makes me actually feel sick to think this is how it's going to go.
Well, that's me finished with my frequent yearly travels to the USA - seems it's turning into North Korea now... https://t.co/2PxP1etzPf
We are forecasting a high of 35 degrees in the shade in #Gisborne on Sunday.
@ZeldaWynn @nzherald just scraping the surface of the incorrect or nasty things they say to me off the record/privately/behind the scenes.
@ZeldaWynn @nzherald GG also said I'm only accurate within my bubble of supporters - I laughed, knowing they never admit when wrong & I do!
I won't lie, it's gone behind the fridge and I'm too lazy to fish it back out... but I'm getting complaints now, so… https://t.co/OqMoxAlKFC
@ZeldaWynn @nzherald my exact words to her! (Was the day we forecast snow in Auckland in 2011, she said they did too - just not publicly!)
@ZeldaWynn @nzherald she wasn't nervous when she rang me at home one day to blast me for an interview that WW got right & they got wrong!
True - it's miserable for this far north... https://t.co/LbgddhqKBE
@macgibbons @waihisurfie there's something artistic in it :)
@RFStew what else does a private weather bum do
@RFStew you get retweets because a) I still feel bad for how hungover I was, and b) I'm watching Fargo TV series for first time + scotch
@TomSaterCNN it's as if Trump is running the weather now too! ;)
With this weather in Auckland I may as well be back in Fargo - at least it was sunny with the cold
Finally! Make the most of it WestCoasters aka WetCoasters https://t.co/Kt9HG09ndD
@FoxNews Tucker looks cartoonishly freaked out in every single screenshot you have *ever* shown of him...
@TomSaterCNN Coz you're in charge of global weather can you please take a little summer away from Australia & give to us in New Zealand?!

@kiwijanna you captured the city at the perfect time - it looks kinda boring out there now!
@kiwijanna awesome pics!
@ZeldaWynn @nzherald still doing Focus videos for now, always enjoyable :)
@blairdrysdale77 @rowie_nz @TheCountry yeah it's slipped behind the fridge - bit of admin to get it out, but working on it
@rowie_nz @TheCountry haha! Yes, always a fun challenge.....!!
A month ago it was Christmas Eve.

@Vectorltd always just an email away if you need a decent detailed update before an event, to help limit any potential surprises :)
I've had about 30 tornado alerts from the US southeast so far today - unusual for winter https://t.co/9FFV75daas
@blakers_newport best you don't look at the long range forecast then... oh but Saturday looks ok!
@Vectorltd - We warned NZ of this storm last Weds...if you're keen to chat with us about services we can help you better plan for storms!
@stevebiddle yeah possibly a safe bet that one.... !!
@stevebiddle nothing yet - my gut instinct is that a neutral pattern will remain into Autumn (meaning much more of the same to come)
@TonyStuart55 @aotearoaxi we are only 8 hours into "this week"...!
Summer-like weather returns to NZ this week, but without a doubt the further south you are in NZ the more 'spring-like" the weather is.
@nzta_news so long as by safe speed you're not encouraging people to drive 65 in 100 zones, which leads to forced overtaking
@YvonneMilroy yay! I'm happy with that - honoured to serve! :)
@YvonneMilroy whoop! Thanks :) nice to see!
Back on @Country_TV tomorrow night - can't wait! So much to talk about as we head into what may be a dry February for many.
@drewdeakin it may be getting a little bumpier before it gets calmer - but not as bad as yesterday for most. Have a good flight!
Forecasting NZ's weather at the moment gives me an appreciation of what it's like to be a parent with their children eating loads of sugar.
@chilled_as @BallyshonogFarm @tutukaus @PaulBMcGill @WoolstonDavid in NZ there's *always* someone who loves the current weather pattern :)
@chilled_as @BallyshonogFarm @tutukaus @PaulBMcGill @WoolstonDavid ouch... and the next two weeks don't look wet.
@BallyshonogFarm haha!! Excellent - send more upset tweets about no rain today and maybe it will start pouring!
Depressing. Can see the ranges stopping the rain - not good. Still some chance over next 24 hours so good luck! https://t.co/1FzZBGGEwq
@PaulBMcGill @WoolstonDavid yeah that's disappointing - the front was very fractured so some had decent rain, others a shorter burst
